name: ListFileManagerFolders
description:
Retrieve a list of folders from the File Manager.

This tool is used to obtain a list of all folders available in the File Manager, which is helpful for organizing and accessing files efficiently.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the response. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of folder records to return, from 1 to 1000. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: created_by_user
parameters.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

value_schema.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

parameters.name: restrict_to_files_created_before
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created before the specified date using ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: created_after_date
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created after the specified date in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

value_schema.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

parameters.name: before_created_at
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: since_created_at
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
